name: Nun Horror: Evil Neighbor
description:
Remember al basics of surviving, as you will need them in this fort of evil. Some horrific nights await you. Prepare yourself to spend several nights in the fort of an evil nun, your new neighbor. The evil nun has a creepy outfit and she will punish you for bad marks in your high school. This evil nun will follow your every step if she hears you. Hide at any available place, as if evil nun reaches you, she will frighten you and nun will punish you for your bad marks in your high school. So remember basics of surviving in the creepy fort and hide, as you never know when you will have to run. Evil nun will not gift you marshmallow for bad marks of math basics, which you had in your high school. To escape horrific fort of the evil nun, you have to survive there for some time, so remember the basics of surviving, which you have learned in your high school. Can you deal with this problem and do not let your new neighbor punish you for bad marks from your high school? Find it out in our new horror simulator: Nun Horror: Evil Neighbor.

In this horror simulator, you should remember the basics of surviving, as minimal noise will unravel your location to the evil nun. You have to survive several nights in the frightening fort of this walking evil creature, but this is not that simple, as it seems. Get ready to run away each time you hear creepy noise of nun, she obviously trying to reach you not for gifting you tasty marshmallow. So hide and sneak for as long as you can, because if she hears you, she will frighten you so hard that you will forget sweet taste of marshmallow and she will punish you for your bad marks in your high school. Do not let evil nun capture you, she will not gift you any marshmallow. Sneak and hide for as long as you can, survive in this fort of horror and escape this evil place of the nun. Share this horror simulator with your friends and find out, who will escape faster from your new evil neighbor, who does not like the taste of marshmallow, in our new horror simulator.

Nun Horror: Evil Neighbor is a free to play horror simulator, in which you will have to sneak and hide from your new neighbor- evil nun. Nights full of horror and punishment for bad marks in high school awaits you in the fort of the evil nun. Get ready to run away from your new neighbor, who does not like marshmallow, she will try to punish you for bad marks in your high school, so remember all basics of surviving in creepy forts, which you have learned. Gather your friends and find out who will escape faster from the evil nun and will not stay long in that fort of horror. Survive these several nights and escape creepy fort in our new horror simulator.
